participant_1.background:
My favorite place to eat is my local sushi bar because I love trying new things and their sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I feel the most confident when I'm wearing makeup and listening to Charlie Daniels.
I can remember listening to my parents' Beatles record over and over again.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
my parents both are school teachers.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.

content.text: I love sushi! What about you?
Me too! I love trying new things and my local sushi bar has really fresh sushi.
That sounds awesome! I've been wanting to try a new sushi place.
You should! I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
That's a great idea! I'm more of a listener than a photographer, but I do love going to festivals.
Me too! I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
That sounds like so much fun! I wish I had more friends, but I'm single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to find time for your art. I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
That sounds like a lot to juggle! I hope you're able to find the support you need.
